text: Danka Barteková is a skeet shooter from Slovakia. ==Career== She won eighth place in the 2008 Olympics. She won the bronze medal at the 2012 Olympics. She also competed in the 2016 Olympics. In 2012, Barteková was picked to be in the IOC Athletes' Commission. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Slovakia Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Czechoslovakia Category:Sport shooters
title: Danka Barteková
